Html:
Hi,

I'm new in this technology and i want to use it to display maps in a windows mobile application. 

But i dont know how to load tiles from a file a file that contains my tiles to the cache folder. and i have problem to display maps in a server mode (have the message "no internet connection").

please it's important for my final thesis so any answer can help .

Hi , 

i had download the tiles of entire Algeria and saved them in a file . what i want to do is to display this tiles in a mobile (PDA MC65) according of the user position. i tried to use the Gmap control to do it but i didn't succeed :( i also tried to change map cache . Please can u help me to use Gmap if it's not possible just show me how to draw the tiles in a WinForm Control . 

 

thank u
deploy gmap application, copy/paste the cache files, done.
